original_text: Then he can go into the inside yard of the temple to serve me there. On the day that he goes back there, he must make a sin offering for himself. That is what the Almighty Lord says.
korean_text: 성소에서 수종들기 위해 안뜰과 성소에 들어갈 때에는 속죄제를 드릴지니라 주 여호와의 말씀이니라

sentences.original_text: Then he can go into the inside yard
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 그는 안뜰로 들어갈 수 있고

sentences.original_text: On the day that he goes back there
he must make a sin offering for himself
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 자신을 위해 속죄 제물을 드려야 한다

sentences.original_text: That is what the Almighty Lord says
